name: Spectral strike
effects: Single attack with a 1.35x multiplier that inflicts bleed
Ignores armor
Cannot be evaded
leaderEffects: All allies gain a high chance to cause bleed on non-special attacks

name: Meditate
effects: Applies 'Power up 2' status to self
'Power up 2' increases critical, resist, magic and physical by 42.5%
leaderEffects: Meditate also applies 'Power up 1' status to all allies including self
'Power up 1' increases magic and physical by 16.5%

name: Cleave
effects: Attacks all enemies on a single row with a 1.55x multiplier
The row with the most enemies is targeted
leaderEffects: Applies 'Frenzy' status to all allies including self
'Frenzy' increases critical % by either 2x or +14% (whichever is higher)

name: Taunt
effects: Applies 'Taunt' status to self
'Taunt' forces all enemies to target the tank
'Taunt' increases armor by 100%
'Taunt' gives a 38% chance to counter attack when hit by a non-special attack
Chance to counter with 'Taunt' is further increased based on speed
leaderEffects: Applies 'Fortify' status to all allies including self
'Fortify' increases armor by 100% or +90 (whichever is higher)
'Fortify' gives an additional 12% chance to counter with 'Taunt'

name: Curse
effects: Single attack with a 1x multiplier that inflicts fear
'Fear' causes the target to skip their next turn
'Fear' reduces resistance by 50%
Attacker heals for 70% of the damage dealt
Removes a random buff status from the target
A critical hit removes a second random buff status from the target
leaderEffects: Applies 'Spread the fear' status to all allies including self
'Spread the fear' gives a high chance to inflict fear on non-special attacks

name: Blessing
effects: Heals all allies for 4.9x the healers resistance stat
Cleanses all allies, removing any negative status effects
leaderEffects: Applies 'Cleansing Aura' status to all healer and tank allies
'Cleansing Aura' status regenrates healers for 0.6x their resistance stat per turn
'Cleansing Aura' status regenrates tanks for 10HP per turn
'Cleansing Aura' increases the healers heal to 5.7x their resistance stat

name: Thunder
effects: Attacks all enemies with a 0.7x multiplier
Has a 20% chance to inflict stun on each enemy hit
'Stun' reduces the targets speed by 20%
leaderEffects: Applies 'Channel the Coven' status to all allies
'Channel the Coven' status increases magic by 17.5%
'Channel the Coven' increases the chance to inflict stun to 80%

name: Devastating Smash
effects: Single attack with a 2.8x multiplier
Has a 30% chance to do another attack with a 1.75x multiplier
leaderEffects: Applies 'Clan Momentum' status to all allies
'Clan momentum' status increases physical by 17.5%
'Clan momentum' status increases the chance to do a second attack on Devastating Smash to 60%
